content: JERUSALEM  Nov 8 Israel Chemicals (ICL) swung to a profit in the third quarter  reporting on Wednesday its highest quarterly sales in three years  boosted by growth in its advanced additives business.
name: Israel Chemicals Shs
title: Israel Chemicals swings to Q3 profit  specialty business dominant

content: * ICL Israel Chemicals Ltd - ‍by its subsidiary Dead Sea Works (DSW) signed an agreement for first stage of salt harvesting project​
name: Israel Chemicals Shs
title: BRIEF-Israel Chemicals Ltd - ‍by its subsidiary DSW signed an agreement for salt harvesting project​

content: * ICL signs contracts to supply 750 000 tonnes of potash to its customers in India

content: JERUSALEM  Aug 3 Israel Chemicals (ICL) reported on Thursday a drop in second quarter net profit due to a decline in revenue stemming from lower potash prices and higher tax payments.
name: Israel Chemicals Shs
title: Israel Chemicals Q2 revenue  profit drop

content: * Q2 revenue $1.32 billion versus $1.38 billion previous year
name: Israel Chemicals Shs
title: BRIEF-Israel Chemicals Q2 profit dips

title: BRIEF-Israel Chemicals signs several potash supply deals in China

content: Chinese and Indian buyers of the crop fertilizer potash are seeking a cut of $10 to $20 per tonne in their next contracts with global suppliers  the chief executive of ICL Israel Chemicals Ltd said on Thursday.
name: Israel Chemicals Shs
title: China  India seeking potash discounts -ICL chief

content: Chinese and Indian buyers of the crop fertilizer potash are seeking a cut of $10 to $20 per tonne in their next contracts with global suppliers  the chief executive of ICL Israel Chemicals Ltd said on Thursday.
name: Israel Chemicals Shs
title: China  India seeking potash discounts - ICL chief
